scenes.background: Bob and Monica are frustrated, discussing the task while you join via video call.
scenes.description: 'We followed your summary, but we are stuck on one part. Can you walk us through this step?'

options.text: Let's go through it step-by-step together quickly.
options.analysis: You showed a willingness to help and strong empathy, but self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: I'll quickly explain, but after this, try to handle the rest yourselves.
options.analysis: You showed a balance between helping and setting boundaries, demonstrating good self-regulation.

options.text: I believe you both can manage it. Check the detailed guidelines I sent.
options.analysis: You maintained your boundaries, showing strong self-regulation, but perception, empathy, and motivation were lower.
